name: Open World Mafia Crime City
description:
Welcome to the mafia crime city where you have been assigned the task to eradicate crime from the city as it awaits a superhero just like you to come and solve the gangster problem which has been on the rise since the last superhero has vanished. Now the responsibility lies on your head to save the city's amazing people from gangsters and put all of them in jail with the help of police.

Get ready for this amazing adventure as this game will change your normal life to superhero life.

Download and hop on to the adventure.
